author: Special Correspondent
text:
Police have recovered the decomposed body of a two-day-old baby boy from the banks of the Tamirabharani at Kokkirakulam here.

The body, which had been dumped in thorny bushes, was recovered on Friday after some people who came to the river to take bath in the morning alerted the police. A name badge had been tied to the left hand of the body. Further investigation is on.
title: Baby’s body recovered
